com.toxic.core.engine.resources

Interface ITextFormat


  • public interface ITextFormat

    Represent text formating(behavior) on certain element. You can bind it through the method : IElement#setTextFromat(TextFormat) .


    Author:
    Strelock

    • Method Detail

      • getColor

        int getColor()
        Returns:
        integer representation of color by HEX pattern 0xAARRGGBB

      • setMargin

        void setMargin(float top,
             float right,
             float bottom,
             float left)

        Set margin of certain element.


        Parameters:
        top - margin for top of bind element
        right - margin for right of bind element
        bottom - margin for bottom of bind element
        left - margin for left of bind element

      • setMargin

        void setMargin(float horizontal,
             float vertical)

        Set margin of certain element.


        Parameters:
        horizontal - margin for top and bottom of bind element
        vertical - margin for right and left of bind element
